io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.contextspace

Class StandardContextSpaceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • io.janusproject.services.AbstractDependentService
        • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.contextspace.StandardContextSpaceService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, ContextSpaceService, DependentService

    public class StandardContextSpaceService
extends AbstractDependentService
implements ContextSpaceService
    A repository of Agent's context and spaces that is based on the other Janus platform services.
    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Nicolas Gaud, Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

      • getServiceDependencies

        public Collection<Class<? extends Service>> getServiceDependencies()
        Description copied from interface: DependentService
        Replies the services that must be launched BEFORE launching this service, and that must be stop AFTER stopping this service.

        If one of the dependencies is a AsyncStateService, this service will way until AsyncStateService.isReadyForOtherServices() is true.

        Specified by:
        getServiceDependencies in interface DependentService
        Overrides:

      • getContexts

        public Collection<io.sarl.lang.core.AgentContext> getContexts(Collection<UUID> contextIDs)
        Description copied from interface: ContextSpaceService
        Returns the collection of AgentContext with the given IDs.

        The replies collection is synchronized and any iteration on it must be synchronized on the mutex replies by ContextSpaceService.mutex().

        Specified by:
        getContexts in interface ContextSpaceService
        Parameters:
        contextIDs - - the identifiers of the contexts to retreive.
        Returns:
        the collection of AgentContext with the given IDs

        Specified by:
